newsitem.title: FRANCE: EU awards 30.25 ECU oats export refund -traders.
newsitem.headline: EU awards 30.25 ECU oats export refund -traders.

text.p: The European Union on Thursday granted over 90,000 tonnes of oats exports from the free market at a maximum refund of 30.25 Ecus per tonne, grain traders said.
Officials said earlier the EU had awarded wheat, barley and rye exports from the free market but had no word on whether or not the EU had also granted oats exports.
Traders reported volumes of 96,500 tonnes, 98,500 tonnes or between 90,000 and 95,000 tonnes for the exports.
Oats exports come from Finland and Sweden and are likely to be sold to the United States as feed grain, traders said.
